summary: TL* TAKATA RECALL. THE CONTACT OWNS A 2007 FORD FUSION. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17V024000 (AIR BAGS). THE MANUFACTURER FAILED TO PROVIDE THE PART WITHIN A REASONABLE TIMEFRAME. GERVAIS FORD (5 LITTLETON RD, AYER, MA 01432, (978) 772-6600) STATED THAT THE PART WAS NOT AVAILABLE AND MADE NO MENTION OF A LOANER VEHICLE. THE VEHICLE HAD NOT BEEN REPAIRED FOR MONTHS. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. VIN TOOL CONFIRMS PARTS NOT AVAILABLE. *TT  CONSUMER STATED AIR BAG WAS REPLACED ON JANUARY 28,2019.*JB
